cmp: 回 ((a measure word for matters or actions) a time/to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Islam)
mng: without authority, to usurp, to arrogate to oneself, to monopolize, expert in, to be good at

exm.mng: to be good at, to be expert in
without permission, of one's own initiative
